Description: The following statement contains a magic number: app.Run(context =>              {                  context.Response.StatusCode = 200;                  context.Response.ContentType = "text/plain";                  // HACK: Setting the Content-Length header manually avoids the cost of serializing the int to a string.                  //       This is instead of: httpContext.Response.ContentLength = _helloWorldPayload.Length;                  context.Response.Headers["Content-Length"] = "13";                  return context.Response.Body.WriteAsync(_helloWorldPayload' 0' _helloWorldPayload.Length);              });
